'''Eli''' is the nephew of [[Claire Conway]].

==History==
Eli was at a convenience store with his Aunt Claire and his brother, [[Gabe]], when his aunt collapsed. They accompanied her to the ER, where she was diagnosed with toxic megacolon and had surgery to remove a portion of her colon. After the surgery, Claire talked to Gabe and Eli about how scary it had been when she collapsed and sent them to the cafeteria to get pizza to eat.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
He started living with his aunt and brother after their mother died.

==Notes and Trivia==
*Eli only recently stopped crying at night.
